oshi.software.os

Class OSFileStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • oshi.software.os.OSFileStore

  • public class OSFileStore
extends Object
    The File System is a storage pool, device, partition, volume, concrete file system or other implementation specific means of file storage. See subclasses for definitions as they apply to specific platforms.
    Author:
    widdis[at]gmail[dot]com
